intellicoach.name: intelli.coach
intellicoach.short_description: App that helps youth sports coaches revolutionize their substitutions
intellicoach.long_description:
I designed intelli.coach to help youth sports coaches create fair and balanced lineups. When coaching my little brother's soccer team alongside my dad, I planned lineups before the game only to have to change my plan when a player showed up late or was injured. I realized there had to be a better way.

Thus, intelli.coach was born. The first version was a web app designed specifically for our team, but after talking with other coaches I determined there was a need for a tool that could improve the coaching experience for coaches around the world. I spent years iterating and testing an algorithm to distribute fair playtime while also maximizing lineup strength.

intelli.coach is available on the Apple App Store and used by over 1,500 coaches in over 30 countries.

publishedwork.name: Journalism Work
publishedwork.short_description: Journalism projects I've worked on during my time at UNC
publishedwork.long_description: I worked as a Staff Writer for the Daily Tar Heel's University desk during the 2023-24 school year, where I produced many articles about events and issues important to the campus community. I also produced a digital story about UNC's student radio station, WXYC.
features: Published in the Daily Tar Heel

aboutme.name: About Me
aboutme.long_description:
My name is Lucas Moore, I'm a sophomore at UNC Chapel Hill in the Honors Carolina program. I'm majoring in computer science with a minor in journalism, two of my lifelong interests that I'm expanding on at Carolina.

Outside of class, I'm an avid rock climber. I work at UNC's campus climbing wall and as an expedition leader for the school's outdoor expeditions program.
